body:
Comment 65: 
I attached the conf in comment # 45.

For load, just use it as a web proxy. Most of the time, I'm only running one computer
through it, so having a heavy load on the redwood-filter process itself is not
necessary, although putting a heavy load in the server as a whole seems to make the
crashes more likely.

By the way, I just ran memtest on my server for a few hours. I didn't find any errors,
so that tends to confirm that this isn't a hardware problem.
